content: स्वामिन् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (नी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [स्व-अस्त्यर्थे मिनि दीर्घः] Possessing proprietory rights. {%--<ab>m.</ab>%} {@--1@} A proprietor, an owner. {@--2@} A lord, master; रघुस्वामिनः सच्चरित्रं <ls>Vikr. 18. 107.</ls> {@--3@} A sovereign, king, monarch. {@--4@} A husband. {@--5@} A spiritual preceptor. {@--6@} A learned Brāhmaṇa, an ascetic or religious man of the highest order; (in this sense usually added to proper names). {@--7@} An epithet of Kārtikeya. {@--8@} Of Viṣṇu. {@--9@} Of Śiva. {@--10@} Of the sage Vātsyāyana. {@--11@} Of Garuḍa.
